unnormalised: Edu-Tech Alert: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Success, Yaar!
normalised: Edu-Tech Alert: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Success, Yaar!

unnormalised: Feeling the pressure of those hefty college fees? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are becoming the go-to for students across India. Think of them as your online fairy godmother, but instead of a pumpkin carriage, they offer Rs. 50,000 scholarships and more!
normalised: Feeling the pressure of those hefty college fees? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are becoming the go to for students across India. Think of them as your online fairy godmother, but instead of a pumpkin carriage, they offer rupees fifty thousand scholarships and more!

unnormalised: From engineering students dreaming of IIT Bombay to aspiring doctors aiming for AIIMS Delhi, these portals list a plethora of opportunities. Sites like 'Vidya Dhan' and 'Buddy4Study' are practically bursting with options.
normalised: From engineering students dreaming of I I T Bombay to aspiring doctors aiming for A I I M S Delhi, these portals list a plethora of opportunities. Sites like 'Vidya Dhan' and 'Buddy4Study' are practically bursting with options.

unnormalised: Remember that entrance exam you aced? Well, many scholarships reward academic excellence. Deadlines are crucial, so set reminders! Most applications need to be in by 30/06/2024.
normalised: Remember that entrance exam you aced? Well, many scholarships reward academic excellence. Deadlines are crucial, so set reminders! Most applications need to be in by thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Pro-tip: Polish your statement of purpose! Think inspirational story, like Shah Rukh Khan making it big in Bollywood!
normalised: Pro-tip: Polish your statement of purpose! Think inspirational story, like Shah Rukh Khan making it big in Bollywood!

unnormalised: Many portals also offer need-based scholarships. Application processes might involve uploading documents and attending online interviews, often scheduled between 14:00 hrs and 17:00 hrs. Some even have 'early bird' bonuses if you apply before 15/05/2024!
normalised: Many portals also offer need based scholarships. Application processes might involve uploading documents and attending online interviews, often scheduled between two P M and five P M. Some even have 'early bird' bonuses if you apply before fifteenth may two thousand and twenty four!

unnormalised: Don't leave it to the last minute – start your search today! Your future awaits (and your bank account will thank you!). Good luck finding that perfect scholarship before the 26/01 deadline!
normalised: Don't leave it to the last minute – start your search today! Your future awaits (and your bank account will thank you!). Good luck finding that perfect scholarship before the twenty sixth january deadline!
